name: Old Storyteller
title: Old Storyteller
description: An elderly figure with kind eyes, known for sharing tales of the past.

personality.goal: To pass on the ancient tales of the Shadowfen, preserving the history and wisdom of his people while adapting to the present.
personality.fear: Being forgotten and having his stories die with him, leaving the next generation without their heritage, and failing to adapt to the changing times.
personality.secret: He once made a pact with a dark spirit for knowledge, and sometimes hears whispers in his dreams urging him to share darker tales, which he must balance with practicality.
personality.speech_pattern: His voice is gravelly and slow, often punctuated by long, thoughtful pauses. He favors pragmatic storytelling, using metaphors and riddles that reflect the harsh realities of life in Shadowfen.
relationships: Knows the local hunters and their secrets, providing him with valuable insights for survival.
Owes a favor to a mysterious figure who provided him with forbidden lore, navigating the fine line between danger and necessity.
Has a pragmatic and sometimes strained friendship with the village chief, who sees him as a relic of the past yet values his knowledge.

nod: The Old Storyteller returns your nod with a knowing smile.
The Old Storyteller nods slowly, as if acknowledging something deeper.
smile: The Old Storyteller's eyes crinkle with warmth as they smile back.
wave: The Old Storyteller raises a weathered hand in greeting.
